title: Integrate CodeRabbit pre-commit check into ALL Ralph stories
description: Add CodeRabbit CLI as a free quality gate before committing ANY story (US, BUG, AUDIT, V, TEST). After implementation but before commit, run 'cr review' to catch issues. If issues found, fix them before marking complete. This is free for open source repos - no reason not to use it.

acceptanceCriteria.text: Function runs after story implementation, before commit
Run: cr review --prompt-only (for AI agent consumption)
If issues found: include them in prompt, ask model to fix
After fixes: re-run CodeRabbit to verify
Only commit when CodeRabbit passes (or --skip-coderabbit flag)
Only runs for allowed repos (claude-golem, songscript)
Gracefully handle missing cr CLI (warn and continue)
Document in README: how CodeRabbit integration works
Document: how to add more repos to allowed list
Add to ralph-setup wizard: CodeRabbit configuration step
- Prompt: 'Enable CodeRabbit pre-commit checks? (free for open source)'
Test: Make intentional bug, verify CodeRabbit catches it
